lines: 1. Nawinjo Yesu kowacho,"Bii Ira mond` iyue;In ng`a mojony,bi mond` iyue,Iyud yueyo kuoma."Nabirone kaka nabet,Najony, naol chutho;Yesu nomiyoa yueyo,Omiyo chunya mor.
2. Nawinjo Yesu kowacho,"Namii pi ngima;Ka riyo maki, bi ira,modhi, iyud ngima."Nabirone mit namodho,pigno momiyoa;Riyo norumo, to koroangima kuom Ruodha.
3. Nawinjo Yesu kowacho,"Abedo ler mar piny;Ng`iya koro, mudho norum,nibed gi ler pile."Nang`iyo Yesu, mayudo,ler kaka mar wang` chieng`;Nawuothi koro e lernonyaka wuodha norum.
